title: How to Eliminate Grey Hair (Sage or Rosemary Method)

steps.headline: Make a brew of sage or sage and rosemary.
Take one cup of sage or 2/3 sage and 1/3 rosemary and add 3 cups of boiling water.
Let it cool.
steps.description: Add 2 spoons of apple cider vinegar.

steps.headline: Put it in a glass bottle (not plastic).
Rub  or spray a little on your hair 4-5 times a  week and let dry or use as a rinse after washing.

text: Make a brew of sage or sage and rosemary.  Take one cup of sage or 2/3 sage and 1/3 rosemary and add 3 cups of boiling water. Simmer for 15-20 minutes gently. Let it cool. Add 2 spoons of apple cider vinegar. Put it in a glass bottle (not plastic).  Rub  or spray a little on your hair 4-5 times a  week and let dry or use as a rinse after washing.
